g.text: Support and actionable steps tailored to your assessed stress level.
Support and validation: It sounds like you are going through a difficult period â€” that's understandable and you're not alone.
1. Try a 15-minute wind-down routine before bed to improve sleep quality.
2. Break study tasks into 25-minute focused sessions (Pomodoro) to reduce study load stress.
3. Reach out to one trusted peer or a faculty member this week to discuss career concerns.
If symptoms are severe or persistent, consider contacting campus mental health services.
